stories.intro: Do you want to get personal data of some person and don’t know what to do? Fill out the form, send the victim a link and find out everything about it that the browser knows.
stories.emailField: An email will be sent to the entered email with the data that was received.
stories.redirectUrlField: After clicking on the generated link, the victim will be redirected to the link that you enter in the "Redirect URL" field.
stories.hideUrlAddressOption: The "Hide URL address" option allows you to hide our domain so that the victim does not suspect anything.
stories.riskyOptions: Use the "Try to get geolocation", "Take a photo" and "Record an audio" options at your own risk, as this will request additional permissions from the victim, which may provoke suspicion.
stories.final: Copy the link and send it to anyone. Enjoy!
